title: Deadlands Hunt
description: Born to the finer things in life, Amethyst finds her comfortable world turned upside down when she seeks to discover the truth about her sisterâ€™s disappearance. Chase is a Weren and one of the many dangers she expected to find but was ill prepared to deal with. He is the one who can help her find the answers she seeks; yet accepting his help comes at a cost.
author: G.L. Drummond
